messages.title: Jobs and hope for young people
messages.content: Unemployment continues to rise in Scotland. It is at record levels among young people. [Snipped content] Mike Crockart is campaigning for a fair deal for people on low pay, and people without a job at all.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mike Crockart is campaigning for a fair deal for people on low pay, and people without a job at all, focusing on job creation in any way he can and ensuring those already affected receive every support available to them.

The Liberal Democrats have run a campaign demanding that our armed forces get the fair pay and the equipment they deserve. Crockart wants to cut waste in the Ministry of Defence to make sure that soldiers are paid at least the amount as now paid to teachers, which would mean a pay rise of up to Â£6000 for many British soldiers.

images.caption: Edinburgh West candidate Mike Crockart chats to local young people about the decisions they face following school and university.
